title: ‘Not My Specialty but I’m Going to Try’: Can Mathieu van der Poel Pip Pogacar at Liège-Bastogne-Liège?
content:
Van der Poel brings his cobble-bashing brawn to the Ardennes for a face-off with Tadej Pogačar that's set to be the biggest bout of the spring.

Read the full article at ‘Not My Specialty but I’m Going to Try’: Can Mathieu van der Poel Pip Pogacar at Liège-Bastogne-Liège? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
